Constructor Detail

LineSegment

public LineSegment(int x1,
                   int y1,
                   int x2,
                   int y2)
Constructs a new LineSegment with the specified endpositions

Parameters:
x1 - X-coordinate of the first endposition of the segment.
y1 - Y-coordinate of the first endposition of the segment.
x2 - X-coordinate of the second endposition of the segment.
y2 - Y-coordinate of the second endposition of the segment.

LineSegment

public LineSegment(Position p1,
                   Position p2)
Constructor for objects of class LineSegment

Parameters:
p1 - One endposition of the line segment
p2 - The other endposition of the line segment
Method Detail

getP1

public Position getP1()
Retrieves the first position.

Returns:
The first position

getP2

public Position getP2()
Retrieves the second position.

Returns:
The second position

getPositions

public Collection<Position> getPositions()
Retrieves a collection of the positions that form the line segment. This uses Bresenham's line algorithm The algorithm is described in more detail at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bresenham's_line_algorithm

Returns:
A collection of the position that form the segment.
